segments.text: My attention shifts to the other side of the kitchen, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, his hand deep inside a "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement on his face, though he's trying to be quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, her arm raised, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager, almost bouncing with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret cookie raid, right under the adult's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, perfecting their technique.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sort of secret-keeping is part of childhood, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool really worries me; it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're having such a good time, though; it's hard not to smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
